title: MONT MARTE Extra Soft Oil Pastels 39pc, Assorted Bright Colors, Vibrant and Buttery, Versatile Art Pastels for Blending, Layering & Shading, Ideal for Art, Craft, Coloring and Sketching
features: Includes 39 vibrant oil pastels: White (x 4), Lemon Yellow, Yellow, Cadmium Yellow, Tangerine, Orange, Scarlet, Crimson, Fuchsia, Pink, Light Purple, Purple, Violet, Prussian Blue, Ultramarine Blue, Royal Blue, Sky Blue, Aqua Blue, Mint, Viridian, Green, Chartreuse, Terra Verde, Olive Green, Khaki, Dark Olive, Dark Grey, Grey, Yellow Ochre, Apricot, Salmon, Red Oxide, Burnt Sienna, Van Dyke Brown, Taupe, Black
Ultra-soft, buttery texture is exceptional for blending and clean color mixes
Suitable for a range of surfaces including paper, card and canvas
Each oil-based pastel is non toxic and wrapped in paper to help keep your hands clean
Create sgraffito effects, or glazes by applying oil mediums or turpentine with a brush
description: Create bold and vibrant artwork with our Extra Soft Oil Pastels 39pc. p> Inside the set are 36 vibrant oil pastel colors with a smooth texture that applies, blends and mixes seamlessly. Also included are three additional white pastels for creating extra highlights, blends and color combinations. Use this art pastels set on a range of smooth or textured surfaces, including paper, card and canvas. Experiment and create interesting designs, patterns and techniques. Try mixing them with oil mediums or turpentine for a wet, glossy effect.p> Handy hints: Blend colors with pastel blenders, paper stump or brush
